article_title: Vacation Bible School students perform at First Friday
article_text:
Print Email Font Resize Font Resize Vacation Bible School students perform at First Friday

Children from First Presbyterian's "G-Force" Vacation Bible School sing and dance to music they learned this week at the First Friday at First Presbyterian concert Friday. (Sara Waite / Sterling Journal-Advocate) Click photo to enlarge «

1

2

» First Presbyterian's Vacation Bible School drew almost 70 children from preschool through fifth grade for a week of learning about how to live, move and exist with God. (Sara Waite / Sterling Journal-Advocate)



Advertisement









Children who participated in First Presbyterian Church's Vacation Bible School showed off what they learned this week at the final First Friday @ First Presbyterian concert of the season.
